name: Wizards & Dinosaurs
description:
The prophecy foretold that dinosaurs would return to Earth in 2021. Only the most legendary wizard can petrify them back to their graves. Wizards & Dinosaurs is a game for the Atari 2600 console (1977) and runs in the browser using the Stelleratoremulator.

Controls

Spacebar: Start/Fire
Arrow keys: Move
Reset: Shift + Enter
Toggle fullscreen: Enter

Rom

You can download the rom file for use with an emulator or for flashing to a cartridge. If you're looking for an Atari 2600 emulator we recommend Stella, which is free and open source.
